description: The Canadian Transportation Agency requires assistance to smooth Virtual meetings" ,
tags: Verticals - Development of new products or processes
full_summary:
=====================

### Virtual Event Coordinator - Request for Proposal

**Issued by the Canadian Transportation Agency (CTA)**

**Reference Number:** cb-581-73867826 (D312024007)

**Closing Date:** 2023-11-13 at 14:00:00 (EDT)

The Canadian Transportation Agency (CTA) is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers for a Virtual Event Coordinator to support the delivery of online meetings and activities using Zoom.

**Scope of Work:**

* Co-host virtual events and meetings on the Agency's managed Zoom account for public consultations and meetings with stakeholders
* Ensure that meetings do not include sharing of protected information and maintain confidentiality
* Collaborate with Agency-provided court reporters in both English and French to produce transcripts during official consultations and media events, in compliance with Access to Information and Protection of Privacy (ATIP) requirements

**Important Dates:**

* Expected contract start date: 2023-12-04
* Expected contract end date: 2026-03-31

**Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria:**

The CTA will evaluate proposals based on the lowest price.

**Inquiries and Contact Information:**

Inquiries regarding this Request for Proposal (RFP) must be submitted to Nancy Trepanier, Contracting Authority, at nancy.trepanier@otc-cta.gc.ca.

**Notice URL and Attachments:**

The RFP notice and attachments can be found on the Canada Buys website.

**Contract Authority:**

Name: Nancy Trepanier
Email Address: nancy.trepanier@otc-cta.gc.ca
Phone: (873) 455-5986

**Certifications and Trade Agreements:**

The CTA reserves the right to require certification and/or compliance with specific trade agreements, including the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), among others.

**Note:**

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language.

I rewrote the text to be concise and clear, while maintaining the essential details and requirements. I also reorganized the information to follow a standard Request for Proposal (RFP) format. 

The word count for this rewritten entry is approximately 340 words, leaving about 60 words for any additional information you may want to include. Please let me know if you need any further assistance. Enjoy! – AnonThropic (talk) 19:
